review: Super easy to setup and use. I went from in the box to casting my netflix in about 2-3 minutes. Download and install your chromecast app and extensions after you order so you can get going as soon as it arrives!The only thing to note is that it is a bit more difficult to setup on hotel wifi if you plan on travelling. It can still be done but will need to have either a) a laptop/device that can share the wifi connection or b) use a travel router. Problem is the chromecast cannot login to hotel wifi as they usually require a name and password/room number instead of utilizing wifi passwords.

review: It's a great product and have been using it everyday. The problem is that the advertisement of the product makes you think that everything can be displayed on a TV for example; in reality, you can only view for example HBO GO, Nextflix, YouTube and a few others.  But if you have Crackle or Showtime or want to show your pictures to the view on your TV, it doesn't work.I would have still bought it even if I knew all of the streaming it could do or may I say limited; I still have a chance to watch some good movies in another room without going to the main room to watch it.What would make it a 5 start?  Much more selections with variety.
